languages.text: {n}Глейто дергается в одну сторону, в другую, челюсть распахивается и тут же смыкается, суровый рык превращается в пронзительный скулеж... и пес обреченно ложится на брюхо.{/n}
{n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто дергается в одну сторону, в другую, челюсть распахивается и тут же смыкается, суровый рык превращается в пронзительный скулеж... и пес обреченно ложится на брюхо.{/n}

{n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito dreht sich von einer Seite auf die andere und öffnet und schließt dabei seinen Kiefer. Sein Knurren weicht einem Winseln ... und der Hund liegt besiegt auf seinem Bauch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito dreht sich von einer Seite auf die andere und öffnet und schließt dabei seinen Kiefer. Sein Knurren weicht einem Winseln ... und der Hund liegt besiegt auf seinem Bauch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito se balance d'un côté à l'autre tandis que sa mâchoire s'ouvre et se ferme. Son grognement féroce se mue en gémissement perçant... puis il se couche sur le ventre, vaincu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito se balance d'un côté à l'autre tandis que sa mâchoire s'ouvre et se ferme. Son grognement féroce se mue en gémissement perçant... puis il se couche sur le ventre, vaincu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトは体を左右にぴくりと動かしながら、同時に顎を開いたり閉じたりしている。彼の荒々しい唸り声は甲高い鳴き声へと変わり…犬は負けたように腹ばいに横たわった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは体を左右にぴくりと動かしながら、同時に顎を開いたり閉じたりしている。彼の荒々しい唸り声は甲高い鳴き声へと変わり…犬は負けたように腹ばいに横たわった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito se retuerce, primero a un lado y luego al otro, abriendo y cerrando la boca al mismo tiempo. Su gruñido amenazador da paso a un gemido penetrante... y el perro se tumba sobre su vientre, derrotado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito se retuerce, primero a un lado y luego al otro, abriendo y cerrando la boca al mismo tiempo. Su gruñido amenazador da paso a un gemido penetrante... y el perro se tumba sobre su vientre, derrotado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托抽搐着，转向了一侧，随后又转向另一侧。它的下颚既想张开，又想合上，凶狠的咆哮声也变成了刺耳的哀鸣……到最后，这只狗四脚朝天地躺在地上，认输了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托抽搐着，转向了一侧，随后又转向另一侧。它的下颚既想张开，又想合上，凶狠的咆哮声也变成了刺耳的哀鸣……到最后，这只狗四脚朝天地躺在地上，认输了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çenesi bir açılıp bir kapanan Glaito önce bir yana, sonra öteki yana kıpırdanıyor. Haşin hırıltısı, iç burkan bir inlemeye dönüşüyor... Köpek, en sonunda yenilgiyle karnının üzerine yatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito twitches to one side and then the other, his jaw opening and closing at the same time. His harsh growl turns into a piercing whine... and the dog lies on his belly in defeat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito önce bir yana, sonra öteki yana kıpırdanıyor, çenesi bir açılıp bir kapanıyor. Haşin hırıltısı, iç burkan bir inlemeye dönüşüyor... Köpek, en sonunda yenilgiyle karnının üzerine yatıyor.{/n}
